description: Derrick's friends throw a bachelor party that might break up his marriage before it even starts. The Vegas cops cruise by while his buddies are buying the night's "party favours", and the guys scatter ditching each other in a mad dash to out run the fuzz. Derrick ducks into deserted club on the edge of The Strip where Honey is having a very slow night. As she chats up Derrick, the cops come into the bar and in a panic he agrees to the champagne room. His second mistake of the night... The champagne pops, Honey starts working her charm and Derrick is back to this being the best night of his life. That is, until she tells him the champagne starts at a thousand bucks. He's broke, she pissed. Honey has had enough of these California dream boys hustling into Vegas and thinking it's the sample tray at Costco. Derrick is going to fulfill her needs tonight starting by sucking her huge cock that she shoves down his protesting throat. Honey grabs Derrick's cock in one hand and his cell phone in the other and makes it very clear she will call his wife and the cops that just chased him into the club. She fucks his ass, strokes him off and taunts him when his wife calls while he is sucking champagne off her cock and ass.
title: The Champange Room
